entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company involved in various equity incentive plans, compensation plans, and offer letters with individuals such as Colette Kress, Tim Teter, and Donald Robertson.

entities.name: COLETTE KRESS
entities.description: Colette Kress is an individual who received an offer letter from NVIDIA Corporation dated September 13, 2013.

entities.name: TIM TETER
entities.description: Tim Teter is an individual who received an offer letter from NVIDIA Corporation dated December 16, 2016.

entities.name: DONALD ROBERTSON
entities.description: Donald Robertson is an individual who received an offer letter from NVIDIA Corporation dated May 21, 2019.

entities.name: WELLS FARGO BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
entities.description: Wells Fargo Bank, National Association is involved in a credit agreement with NVIDIA Corporation as the administrative agent.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation extended an offer letter to Colette Kress dated September 13, 2013.
NVIDIA Corporation extended an offer letter to Tim Teter dated December 16, 2016.
NVIDIA Corporation extended an offer letter to Donald Robertson dated May 21, 2019.
NVIDIA Corporation entered into a credit agreement with Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, with the latter acting as the administrative agent.
